name: iPhone® 6
highlights:
4.7-inch (diagonal) Retina HD display with 1334-by-750 resolution
A8 chip with M8 motion coprocessor
8-megapixel iSight camera with Focus Pixels and True Tone flash
1080p HD video recording at 60 fps and slo-mo video recording at 240 fps
FaceTime HD camera
Touch ID fingerprint sensor
categoryIcons:
Access the 4G LTE network* to send and receive pictures, download music, watch videos and browse the Internet at speeds up to 10 times faster than 3G. *4G LTE network available only in select cities. See coverage map for details.

Data Plan Required
processor: A8 with 64-bit architecture and M8 coprocessor
deviceFinancingTargeter: If you have financed your device, the financed installment amount is not displayed, and will increase the Total Due Monthly amount on your actual bill.
